data.title: Swimming Pool Pumps Market Size, Share, Industry Trends, Forecast 2032
data.meta_description: Swimming pool pumps market size was estimated at 11.57 (usd billion) in 2023. the swimming pool pumps market industry is expected to grow from 11.97(usd billion) in 2024 to 15.68 (usd billion) by 2032. the swimming pool pumps market cagr (growth rate) is expected to be around 3.43% during the forecast period (2024 - 2032).
data.text:
Swimming Pool Pumps Market Overview :

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Size was estimated at 11.57 (USD Billion) in 2023. The Swimming Pool Pumps Market Industry is expected to grow from 11.97(USD Billion) in 2024 to 15.68 (USD Billion) by 2032. The Swimming Pool Pumps Market CAGR (growth rate) is expected to be around 3.43% during the forecast period (2024 - 2032).

Key Swimming Pool Pumps Market Trends Highlighted

Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market OutlookThe global swimming pool pumps market is anticipated to grow at a constant rate in the upcoming years. The impact is also due to increasing urbanization, rising disposable income, rising interest in water-related activities, government encouragement to adopt energy-efficient products. Market trends include the growing use of technology in the swimming pool such as variable-speed pumps and automatic control systems, smartphone-controlled pool pumps. These trends are anticipated to witness growth in the residential and commercial sectors in the coming decade. The global swimming pool pumps market is expected to reach USD 15.68 billion by 2032.

Source: Primary Research, Secondary Research, WGR Database and Analyst Review

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Drivers

Rising Disposable Income and Urbanization

Factors such as growing affluence of individuals and increasing rate of urbanization are some of the major drivers for the Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market Industry. With the increase in peopleâ€™s disposable income, the demand for luxury and leisure product including swing pool has raised. Urbanization has also helped in the growth of the market. With increased urbanization, the rush and tension in the lives of the people have been also increased. People are moving into cities and cities have become hosting communities to almost relaxation of the people. The growth expected in future is due to the craze for swing pools in urban areas.

Government Initiatives for Energy Efficiency

Another factor driving the Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market Industry is government initiatives to promote energy efficiency. In many countries, the government has been giving incentives to both individual homeowners and businesses to install energy-efficient appliances. This increased the demand for swimming pool pumps that are energy efficient. I expect that the growing awareness about the benefits of using energy-efficient products for the environment will continue to drive the demand for swimming pool pumps in the coming years.

Technological Advancements

The Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market Industry is also experiencing growth due to the rapid pace of technological advances. New technologies have made pumps more efficient as well as convenient for the owners. The sensors and automated control systems make the managing as easy as never before. In addition, now there are variable-speed pumps. They can adjust the water flow speed based on the demand, which is especially useful for pools of variable depth. This can save a significant amount on energy and, as a result, money.

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Segment Insights:

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Pump Type Insights

The Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market is segmented based on Pump Type into Single-Speed Pumps, Variable-Speed Pumps, and Heat Pumps. Single-Speed Pumps Single-speed pumps are the most basic type of pool pump, and they operate at a single speed. This makes them less efficient than variable-speed pumps, but they are also less expensive. Single-speed pumps are typically used in smaller pools, or in pools that are not used very often. Variable-Speed Pumps Variable-speed pumps are more efficient than single-speed pumps, and they can be programmed to operate at different speeds.This allows them to save energy, and it can also help to extend the life of the pump. Variable-speed pumps are typically used in larger pools, or in pools that are used frequently. Heat Pumps Heat pumps are used to heat swimming pools, and they can be either air-source or water-source. Air-source heat pumps are more common, and they work by extracting heat from the air and transferring it to the pool water. Water-source heat pumps work by extracting heat from a body of water, such as a lake or river. The growth of the market is attributed to the increasing number of swimming pools being built around the world, as well as the rising popularity of energy-efficient products.

Source: Primary Research, Secondary Research, WGR Database and Analyst Review

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Pool Size Insights

The Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market is segmented by pool size into small (less than 15,000 gallons), medium (15,000-50,000 gallons), and large (over 50,000 gallons). The small pool size segment is expected to hold a significant share of the market in 2023 and is projected to continue its dominance throughout the forecast period. The increasing popularity of small pools due to space constraints, particularly in urban areas, is driving the growth of this segment. Additionally, the rising demand for energy-efficient and cost-effective pool filtration systems is further contributing to the growth of the small pool size segment.The medium pool size segment is also expected to witness steady growth, primarily attributed to the increasing construction of mid-sized residential pools. The large pool size segment, which includes commercial and public pools, is anticipated to grow at a moderate pace due to the increasing demand for recreational and fitness facilities.

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Application Insights

Residential and commercial applications drive the Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market. In 2023, the residential segment dominated the market, accounting for around 60% of the Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market revenue. The growth of this segment is attributed to the increasing number of residential swimming pools and the rising demand for energy-efficient and automated pool equipment. The commercial segment, which includes hotels, aquatic centers, and other public pools, is also expected to experience significant growth over the forecast period. The growing popularity of water parks and recreational facilities is contributing to the demand for commercial swimming pool pumps.Market players are focusing on developing innovative and sustainable solutions to meet the evolving needs of both residential and commercial customers.

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Flow Rate Insights

The Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market segmentation by flow rate reveals distinct market dynamics. Low flow rate pumps, with a capacity below 50 gallons per minute, cater to smaller pools and spas, representing a significant portion of the market. Medium flow rate pumps, ranging from 50-150 gallons per minute, dominate the market, suitable for mid-sized residential and commercial pools. High flow rate pumps, exceeding 150 gallons per minute, are primarily used in large-scale commercial and public pools, contributing to the overall Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market revenue.

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Energy Efficiency Insights

The Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market is segmented based on energy efficiency into Standard Efficiency, Energy Star Certified, and Variable-Speed Pumps with High Efficiency. The Energy Star Certified segment held the largest market share in 2023, and it is projected to continue its dominance throughout the forecast period. This can be attributed to the growing awareness about energy conservation and the implementation of stringent government regulations promoting energy-efficient products. The Standard Efficiency segment is expected to witness a steady growth rate during the forecast period.These pumps are cost-effective and suitable for small to medium-sized pools. However, their energy consumption is higher compared to Energy Star Certified and Variable-Speed Pumps with High Efficiency. Variable-Speed Pumps with High Efficiency are gaining popularity due to their ability to adjust the flow rate according to the pool's needs, resulting in significant energy savings. The Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market revenue for this segment is projected to grow at a CAGR of over 5% during the forecast period.

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Regional Insights

The Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market is segmented by region into North America, Europe, APAC, South America, and MEA. The North American region held the largest market share in 2024, accounting for around 35% of the global market revenue. The European region is expected to witness significant growth during the forecast period, owing to the increasing demand for swimming pools in residential and commercial properties. The APAC region is projected to be the fastest-growing market, driven by the rising disposable income and urbanization in countries such as China and India.The South American and MEA regions are expected to experience moderate growth during the forecast period.

Source: Primary Research, Secondary Research, WGR Database and Analyst Review

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Key Players And Competitive Insights :

Competitive Insights of the Global Swimming Pool Pumps MarketThe Swimming Pool Pumps Market industry is highly competitive with a number of major players battling for market share. Leading Swimming Pool Pumps Market players consistently innovate and develop new products to cater to the ever-changing needs of the consumers. The Swimming Pool Pumps Market development is being fueled by the high popularity of swimming pools and the growing need for energy-efficient products. Major Players in the Swimming Pool Pumps Market include Pentair, Hayward, Jacuzzi, Sta-Rite, and AstralPool. These companies offer a wide range of swimming pool pumps that cater to the needs of both residential and commercial clients.Pentair Swimming Pool Pumps MarketPentair is a leading swimming pool equipment manufacturer which manufactures swimming pool pumps, filters, and heaters. Their wide range of swimming pool pumps caters to the needs of both residential and commercial customers. Hayward Pumps. Hayward is another major player in the swimming pool industry that manufactures a wide range of pumps, filters, and swimming pool equipment. Jacuzzi Pumps, Jacuzzi is a well-known hot tub and spa manufacturer, but also offers a line of swimming pool pumps. Sta-Rite is another major manufacturer of swimming pool and spa pumps and filters. AstralPool is a global leader in the manufacturing of swimming pool equipment including pumps, filters, and heatersOverview of Two Major PumpsPentair Swimming Pool PumpsThe presence of Pentair in both residential and commercial swimming pool markets is one of the strongest. Swimming pool pumps offered by Pentair are efficient, durable, and reliable.Hayward PumpsHayward is involved in the production of a wide range of swimming pool pumps, pool filters, and other equipment. Their swimming pool pumps are highly efficient and high-performing. Both the competitors Pentair and Hayward are highly innovative and invested in developing novel technologies for improved swimming pool pumps. This feature accounts for their leading presence in the Swimming Pool Pumps Market Competitive Insights.

Swimming Pool Pumps Market Industry Developments

The global swimming pool pumps market is projected to reach USD 15.68 billion by 2032, exhibiting a CAGR of 3.43% during the forecast period (2024-2032)

The market growth is primarily driven by the increasing construction of residential and commercial swimming pools, rising disposable income in emerging economies, and growing awareness about health and well-being

Additionally, technological advancements, such as variable-speed pumps and energy-efficient models, are contributing to market expansion

Key market players are focusing on product innovation and strategic partnerships to gain a competitive edge

Recent market news includes the launch of energy-efficient pool pumps by Hayward Industries and Pentair, and the acquisition of AstralPool by Fluidra, consolidating the market landscape.
